external_references.description: Costa, F. (2022, May 1). RaaS AvosLocker Incident Response Analysis. Retrieved January 11, 2023.

description: During [C0018](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0018), the threat actors used [netsh](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0108) on a domain controller to ensure there was no existing firewall or to disable one.(Citation: Costa AvosLocker May 2022)
